publicUrl.label: User route
publicUrl.helperText: Personalize the URL for your profile
publicUrl.note: Note: Your custom URL must contain 5-100 letters or numbers. We recomend to include an identification string, such as your name. Please, do not use spaces, symbols, or special characters.

menu.shareDescription: Send a email to your fiends to share this app with them.
menu.bugDescription: Report a bug and we will correct it as soon as possible.
menu.donationDescription: Help us to improve growing and scaling by supporting us with a little donation.

settings.securityText1: Tokens are used to allow tha application to have access to your information with one or more providers.You can erase them if you want, aldo, you may have to provide it again if you need to import some other information from the provider.
settings.securityText2: You can double-check this erase action by going to the provider and login with your account, and making the token invalid.
settings.projectSettingText1: Switch your project visibility for your public profile.
settings.deleteProjectDesc: To delete the project you should write the word 'delete'
settings.deleteProfileDesc: To delete your profile you should write the word 'delete'
settings.deleteNote: Note: Be aware that if you DELETE your profile, you will lose all your information.

msg.deleteTokenAks: Are you sure you want to delete the token?
msg.deleteUserProfile: Are you sure you want to delete your profile?
msg.deleteProject: Are you sure you want to delete the selected project?
msg.urlCopied: The public profile URL was copied to the clipboard.
